Enumeration Type Documentation

enum RTC_LSESM_Enum

Selection of RTC LSE startup mode.

Enumerator:
RTC_LSESM_NORMAL 

Little power consumption but longer startup time.

RTC_LSESM_FAST 

Shortly startup time but higher power consumption.

Definition at line 66 of file ht32f5xxxx_rtc.h.

enum RTC_ROAP_Enum

Active polarity of RTC output.

Enumerator:
RTC_ROAP_HIGH 

Active level is high

RTC_ROAP_LOW 

Active level is low

Definition at line 96 of file ht32f5xxxx_rtc.h.

enum RTC_ROES_Enum

Waveform mode of RTC output.

Enumerator:
RTC_ROES_MATCH 

Selected RTC compare match.

RTC_ROES_SECOND 

Selected RTC second clock.

enum RTC_SRC_Enum

Selection of RTC clock source.

Enumerator:
RTC_SRC_LSI 

Low speed internal clock, about 32 kHz

RTC_SRC_LSE 

Low speed external 32768 Hz clock

Definition at line 56 of file ht32f5xxxx_rtc.h.
